name: Vinyl-Killer EP
description:
Dodge, Roll and Slice your way through hordes of hipsters swarming to steal your vinyl.

Vinyl-Killer EP is a game about beheading hipsters with a limited edition vinyl which they all want to posses. Rack up the highest body count and largest score possible without the hipsters breaking your precious vinyl.

Note: This game requires a controller to play.

If you enjoyed the game please vote for it here.

This game was made entirely in 72 hours (for Ludum Dare 32) , art, audio, gameplay. Excluding the song.

Twitter: @marteltweets
